description.value:
Trigger A creature enters the prayer room.

Effect The abbot's spirit appears and begins to channel powerful ki energy. One round later, the room fills with a powerful kinetic storm, dealing @Damage[(3d10+15)[electricity]] damage and @Damage[(3d10+15)[force]] damage to all creatures in the room. Creatures in the room must attempt a @Check[type:reflex|dc:37|traits:haunt] save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes half damage.

Failure The creature takes full damage and becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Deafened] for 1 round.

Critical Failure The creature takes full damage, @Damage[2d8[persistent,electricity]] damage, and becomes deafened for 1 minute.

details.disable: @Check[type:irori-lore|dc:32|name:Restore the Prayer Items|traits:haunt]{Irori Lore} (trained) to clean the room and return the prayer items to their proper arrangement, @Check[type:religion|dc:37|name:Iroran Prayer of Peace] (expert) to state an Iroran prayer of peace and put the haunt to rest, or @Check[type:occultism|dc:40|name:Create a Ward Against Future Hauntings] (master) to create a ward against future hauntings
details.reset: The haunt re-forms after 1 hour. The haunt becomes disabled and doesn't re-form if a creature lights all of the candles in the room and offers a prayer to Irori.
